lex.text: Many interesting facts can be found about California: Alan Shepard -recipient of the United States Navy Distinguished Service Medal (ranked higher than the Department of Commerce Gold Medal) - passed away in this state. lex.text: William Anders who is originally from Hong Kong worked for NASA and became a crew member for Apollo 8 along with Buzz Aldrin and Frank Borman. He retired on September 1st 1969.

references.reference: AFIT in 1962 with an MS. Buzz Aldrin was a back up pilot and Frank Borman a crew member

lex.text: William Anders, retired, was a member of NASA's @ Apollo 8 after graduating from AFIT in 1962 with an MS. Buzz Aldrin was a back up pilot and Frank Borman a crew member.

sentence.striple: William_Anders | was a crew member of | Apollo_8

lex.text: William Anders who graduated from AFIT in 1962 worked for NASA and became a crew member of the Apollo 8 crew along with Frank Borman and Buzz Aldrin as backup pilot. Mr Anders is now retired.
lex.template: AGENT-1 who graduated from PATIENT-1 worked for PATIENT-4 and became a crew member of the BRIDGE-1 crew along with PATIENT-3 and PATIENT-2 as backup pilot . AGENT-1 is now PATIENT-5 .
